amount.comment: Amount units must be specified if amount is specified

duration.comment: Duration units must be specified if duration is specified

documents.description: Documents that describe the treatment protocol.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.comment: The intended purpose for treating the samples. Activation: treatment is known to activate a pathway in the biosample; Agonist: a substance which initiates a physiological response when combined with a receptor. Antagonist: a substance that interferes with or inhibits the physiological action of another Control: treatment is not known to affect the biosample; Differentiation: treatment used for stem cell differentiation pathways; De-differentiation: treatment used to reprogram differentiated cells to stem cells. Perturbation: treatment can cause perturbation in a way that is not activation. Selection: treatment used to affect biosample in a way that can be used to distinguish cells and selected for in the downstream steps. Stimulation: treatment stimulates a cellular pathway.

temperature (Celsius).title: Temperature
temperature (Celsius).comment: Temperature can only be specified in Celsius

post_treatment_time.title: Post-treatment time
post_treatment_time.description: The time past the point when biosamples were removed from the treatment solution before being sampled or treated with the next treatment.
post_treatment_time.comment: Use in conjunction with treatment and post_treatment_time_units to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time_units specification.

post_treatment_time_units.title: Post-treatment time units
post_treatment_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were washed from the treatment solution.
post_treatment_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_treatment_time and treatment to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time_units specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time specification.

treatment_term_id.title: Biosample treatment term ID
treatment_term_id.description: Ontology identifier describing a component in the treatment.

treatment_term_name.title: Biosample treatment
treatment_term_name.description: Ontology term describing a component in the treatment.
